name: Enjoy while we live in Ho Chi Minh city!!
description: If you are tired after working and want to relax in your weekend or your holiday, Ho Chi Minh city will be the best choice for you! We will go around to see the landscape, eat many nice food, spa by the fish and leave your body free in the swimming pool. Especaily, we will enjoy Vietnam coffee in a nice cafe. And we will teach you how to make a cross stitch pictures.
